Thorsten Koller <thorsten.koller@...> wrote:

> "runtests:
>     [junit] Class "AllTests.class" not found
>     [junit] Java Result: -1"
> 
> The files are present in the directories as set in location
> attribute.

Is AllTests in the empty package? Or is it more something like
com.syntegra.de.net.auth.AllTests? You need to give the full classname
as parameter to the test runner.

Cheers

        Stefan
